extension.summary: Written by Einar Lielmanis, maintained and evolved by Liam Newman.
extension.description: Beautify, unpack or deobfuscate JavaScript. Handles popular online obfuscators.

extension.summary: Metadata and artwork from common sources like TMDB, IMDB, TADB and fanart.tv
Metadatos e ilustraciones de fuentes comunes como TMDB, IMDB, TADB y fanart.tv
Πληροφορίες και εικόνες από κοινές πηγές όπως τα TMDB, IMDB, TADB και fanart.tv
extension.description: The metadata and artwork module for Kodi provides rich metadata, including artwork for various metatypes by scraping (and caching) this information from sites like TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.[CR][CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb

El módulo de metadatos e ilustraciones para Kodi proporciona metadatos enriquecidos, que incluyen ilustraciones para varios metatipos al raspar (y almacenar en caché) esta información se extrae de sitios como TMDB, musicbrainz and fanart.tv.[CR][CR]Este producto utiliza la API de TMDb pero no está avalado ni certificado por TMDb

Το σύνολο μονάδων κώδικα για το Kodi παρέχει πλούσια μεταδεδομένα, συμπεριλαμβανομένου και εικόνων από διαφόρους μετατύπους φιλτράρωντας (και αποθηκεύοντας προσωρινά) όλες τις πληροφορίες όπως τα TVDM, musicbrainz και fanart.tv.[CR][CR]Το παρόν σύνολο χρησιμοποιεί το TMDB API, αλλά δεν είναι εγκεκριμένο η πιστοποιημένο από το TMDB
extension.news:
v1.0.35 (wuff) - Remove BeautifulSoup3 dependency and use BeautifulSoup4 on Kodi 18 and 19 instead
v1.0.34 (wuff) - Set BeautifulSoup3 and MusicBrainz dependency as optional to allow install on Matrix
v1.0.33 (wuff) - replace xbmc.LOGNOTICE with xbmc.LOGINFO as LOGNOTICE was removed
v1.0.32 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat - Change imdb Top250 parsing from lxml to html.parser - replace xbmc.translatePath with xmbcvfs.translatePath
v1.0.31 (berkhornet) - Further fixes for PVR artwork
v1.0.30 (berkhornet)
- Kodi 19/Python 3 - Fixes for PVR artwork - Fix display of artwork when manually selecting from TVDB - Fixes for animated art and google
v1.0.29 (wuff) - Remove python requirement for Kodi 18/19 compat
v1.0.28 (wuff) - Kodi 19/Python 3 fixes
v1.0.27 (finkleandeinhorn) - update omdb api key
v1.0.26 (finkleandeinhorn, cartmandos) - enable caching of omdb/tmdb data - remove duplicate "Title" parameter
v1.0.25 (marcelveldt) - Last version 30 Mar 2018

extension.summary: Main resolvers, useful for converting html/js into playable content from various hosts (Greek ones).
extension.description: Main resolvers, useful for converting html/js into playable content from various hosts (Greek ones).
extension.news:
Version 0.0.6 (April 05, 2021) - Update skai - Add mega - Removed euronews
Version 0.0.4 (January 18, 2021) - Updated ert
Version 0.0.3 (January 05, 2021) - Updated alphacy
Version 0.0.2 (January 04, 2021)
- Updated star - Updated ert
Version 0.0.1 (January 04, 2021)
- Initial version

extension.description: Streamlink Library for Kodi. It is a collection of plugins to help resolve web page urls into streamable links. Known issue: Does not work on Xbox, specifically throws exception when trying to import something from ctypes module.
extension.news:
+2020.09.07.1 - Update to latest upstream commit - Remove on demand installation of futures module - Add dummy futures module for Kodi 19
+2020.08.09 - Update to latest upstream commit - Futures module is not set to optional (on Kodi 19 it is not imported)

extension.summary: Tulip library with helper functions for Kodi and its forks
extension.description: Tulip library combines the best elements from Lambda's "lamlib" and tknorris's shared modules. Also includes various enhancements, newer and improved functions and Python 3 compatibility, though the latter is largely untested. Can also be as standalone utils
extension.news:
[B]2.8.X[/B] - Replaced xbmc.python import with xbmc.addon for Matrix compatibility - New utils module - Updated user agent strings - Updated m3u8 modules - Various fixes & tweaks for Kodi 19
[B]2.7.X[/B] - New cache functions (taken from ResolveURL and adapted) - Various other tweaks
